frontmatter.title: Knight bunny, 2023
frontmatter.description: My first try of coping with animation in Blender. I imagine this cute girl could be a character of some game. There is a problem with her face showing through her head, and with the twisted typology as well, but just imagine her as a "suspense monster".

frontmatter.title: Moka pot, 2023
frontmatter.description: This is my first 3D printed creation. This moka pot serves as a vase, home decorration, storage...

frontmatter.title: 3D Moka pot, 2023
frontmatter.description: This is my first 3D printed creation. It's geometry is primitive but effective.

frontmatter.title: Blue-haired girl, 2022
frontmatter.description: Inspired by Harajuku style. This girl loves vibrant japanese street style and that's how she demonstrates her craziness.

frontmatter.title: Draculaura, 2022
frontmatter.description: Draculaura taking a private selfie.

frontmatter.title: Collectable Gods Cards, 2022
frontmatter.description: A school assignment for cards. These are collectible cards of Gods from different mythologies and religions.

frontmatter.title: We, Zamyatin (book cover), 2022
frontmatter.description: One of my favorite book genres are dystopian novels. I got carried away by the story of this book and decided to make a cover for it.

frontmatter.title: The Gift Voucher, 2022
frontmatter.description: A quick design I made for our friends birthday.

frontmatter.title: Pizza with coffee (stickers), 2021
frontmatter.description: I always wanted to make my own stickers and telegram gave me the opportunity and motivation to draw them. If youre a telegram user, you can download them here: https://t.me/addstickers/pizzacoffee

frontmatter.title: MadHatz (logo), 2022
frontmatter.description: Just a quick brand idea me and my friend came up with during a coffee talk.

frontmatter.title: Happy pills (poster), 2022
frontmatter.description: School assignment for lettering. I decided to level up my work and made a whole poster out of it.

frontmatter.title: A wild sheep chase (book cover), 2022
frontmatter.description: A school assignment for a book cover. Haruki Murakami is my favorite author and A wild sheep chase was the first book I read from him, so the choice was obvious.

frontmatter.title: Communication during time-freeze, 2022
frontmatter.description: A school assignment for a poster. Nowadays all the people communicate via their phone and dont notice the world around them.

frontmatter.title: Putin in Loro Piana jacket, 2022
frontmatter.description: A satiric art of dictator.

frontmatter.title: Time, Speed, Distance (poster), 2022
frontmatter.description: A school assignment for a poster.

frontmatter.title: Shopping bag, 2021
frontmatter.description: A school assignment for propagative bag. All the people around me know I am a bookworm and this design is made for the biggest bookshop in Czech republic.

frontmatter.title: Lost wanderers, 2021
frontmatter.description: It initiated as few random strokes of clouds and developed into a small story of two wanderers who are searching for their home.

frontmatter.title: T.M.D.W. (logo), 2021
frontmatter.description: Through Museum walls to Digital World. A school project in which my logo was chosen. Honestly, it was an emotional moment for me and my family. It became a starting point in my more serious design career.

frontmatter.title: Autumn landscape (photo), 2020
frontmatter.description: A beautiful window surrounded by leaves painted/colored in autumn colors.

frontmatter.title: Material contrast (photo), 2020
frontmatter.description: I find the difference between bricks and wood to be very welcoming because these materials are often used as a construct material.

frontmatter.title: Sketch of lying woman, 2020
frontmatter.description: Quick pose sketch from art course.

frontmatter.title: Portrait of a woman with mask, 2020
frontmatter.description: A commercial art during coronavirus times.

frontmatter.title: A man with guitar, 2020
frontmatter.description: This man attended our art course with guitar and all of us wanted to draw him with it. It was quite a challenge getting the perspective right but, in the end, I believe Ive managed to carry out a great result.

frontmatter.title: Portrait of a woman, 2020
frontmatter.description: One of the first commercial art.

frontmatter.title: Study of back, 2019
frontmatter.description: My first-time painting with oil on wood. The decision to use green color as primary made the outlook of this painting mysterious and bewitching.

frontmatter.title: Soyer, 2019
frontmatter.description: Soyer is an endearing boy loved by his friends and teachers.

frontmatter.title: Still life vase, 2019
frontmatter.description: Still life from art course.

frontmatter.title: J-Hope Mic-drop, 2019
frontmatter.description: A fan art of J-Hope during the Mic-drop era.

frontmatter.title: Portrait of David, 2019
frontmatter.description: Drawing from art course. David is definitely a popular character to be visualized by many art students.

frontmatter.title: Copy of Da Vinci, 2019
frontmatter.description: A painting of Lady with an Ermine I painted on art course. I was absolutely engaged in the process of this copy of mine and the final result satisfies me as well. The lady in my work looks quite angry, but I guess that just shows my personality.

frontmatter.title: Accessibility (logo), 2019
frontmatter.description: A project for Microsoft about making computers accessible for handy-caped people.

frontmatter.title: Fire woman, 2019
frontmatter.description: Work from art course of a seductive and dangerous woman.
